attributes.title: Absolutely awful app

attributes.title: Glitch!!!
attributes.review: I barely even got onto the app and it started glitching! Not only did the app glitch my phone has been glitching since I closed it! There might be a virus somewhere on the app I would not recommend downloading it unless you want to get a virus!

attributes.title: the glitches
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE, every time i open this app i have to reset my phone!! everything freezes. the pop up adds are overkill. everything about this app is awful. the bugs are running rampant on it!!

attributes.title: no explicit imagery. disappointed
attributes.review: was told there would be explicit photos of the hottest president to ever have lived on this app in return for my credit card info. was extremely disappointed to find these photos do not exist and I am now $200 short. thanks, Donny. one star. Sad!
